inclusion.criterion: Serum total IGF-I levels must have been normalized during long-term treatment with long-acting somatostatin analogs
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any contra-indication for the use of long-acting somatostatin analogs, as e.g. the use of anti-coagulants.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects with pituitary tumors that compress the optic chiasm
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of acromegaly and underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He is currently taking vitamin D and multivitamins.
